data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Jeollanam-do, South Korea be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jeollanam-do, South Korea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jeollanam-do, South Korea. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Jeollanam-do to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Jeollanam-do words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Malay people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 261,401 people in the state of Jeollanam-do who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Jeollanam-do, South Korea that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 311,220 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,591,080 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
